II. CARRER OBJECTIVES 
I seek challenging opportunitues where I can fully use my skills and experiences for the success 
of the organization. 
I am seeking a company here I can grow professionally and personally. 
To make great applications for many users from over the world. 
To satisfy the passion with technology.

VIII. HOBBIES AND ACTIVITIES 
I prefer to spend free time to study new things and coding. I like traveling with my friend on 
weekend. I also like photography. I have uploaded some photos at: https://500px.com/hhc . I 
usually spend 1 to 2 hours for football or running after work twice a week. Cinema is also a nice 
place to be with friends & family at weekends. Sometime I like to stay alone in my room and 
listen to music.
